question: Electronic Attack Squadron 138 is a type of which American carrier-based electronic warfare aircraft, a specialized version of the two-seat F/A-18F Super Hornet?
llm_answer: Electronic Attack Squadron 138 (VAQ-138) operates the EA-18G Growler, an American carrier-based electronic warfare aircraft that is a specialized version of the two-seat F/A-18F Super Hornet.

scores.explanation: The Model Answer correctly identifies the EA-18G Growler as the aircraft operated by Electronic Attack Squadron 138, matching the Gold Answer. It is fully supported by the Retrieved Context, which explicitly states that the EA-18G Growler is a specialized version of the F/A-18F Super Hornet and is used by VAQ-138. All key facts from the Gold Answer are included.
